EmailTemplate.subject: Set up your Bigcommerce store before your trial ends
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
You still have 3 days in your trial. Log in to launch your store or pick a plan that's right for you.
Resources <[[https://support.bigcommerce.com/articles/University/Welcome-to-Bigcommerce-University-Video/]]>| Log in <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]>
You still have three days in your free trial
Set up your store
Start now <[[https://manage.bigcommerce.com/account/stores/upgrade]]> Don't lose your trial
We noticed you haven't set up your online store yet. You can set it up in just a few easy steps by logging in now.
Or, select the right plan and get the time you need to finish building your store.
Select your plan Â» <[[https://manage.bigcommerce.com/account/stores/upgrade]]>
